main.title: Your chance to make your dream come true!
main.subtitle: is the first social football reality show project in Kazakhstan.

rules.title: The casting of participants will be conducted using a unique selection system and approach devised by our expert project team.
rules.p:
The sports reality show includes a casting phase, followed by a second qualifying match and a final round. During this final phase, participants will undergo professional training under the guidance of the coaching staff, while also participating in regular weekly matches. These matches provide opportunities for potential scouts to observe and potentially offer professional contracts to participants.



The project is carried out on the basis of the following principles: equality and accessibility for all individuals wishing to participate in the project, wellness orientation, prohibition of discrimination and prevention of propaganda of the cult of cruelty, violence and humiliation of human dignity, promotion of the "innovative mentality" in football, increasing youth interest in football, development of youth sports in Kazakhstan.
rules.badge3:
the level of training

does not matter

goals.title: Popularization of sport
goals.p: One of the primary objectives of the SUPER BOL project is to promote and popularize football as a sporting discipline in Kazakhstan. Through the development of a unique reality show format, the project aims to capture the attention of a broad audience, highlighting the sport's excitement, dynamism, and emotional intensity.
goals.quote: Kazakhstan is not rich in oil, it is rich in people.
goals.quoteAuthor: Timur Turlov, CEO of Freedom Holding

superBol2024.content: The participant casting will be conducted using a unique selection system and method developed by the professional team of project organizers. The sports reality show includes a casting stage, a second qualifying match, and a final.
